price: 118. Waxaa kuu sugnaaday halkaan inaadan ku gaajoon kuna arradin.
arabic: إِنَّ لَكَ أَلَّا تَجُوعَ فِيهَا وَلَا تَعۡرَىٰ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna laka allā tajūʿa fīhā walā taʿrā
